short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert and save images with a simple right-click. Support for popular formats including JPG, PNG, WEBP, GIF, BMP, AVIF, and HEIF.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your image handling capabilities with our convenient right-click menu for images. This feature allows you to effortlessly convert images to various formats, including JPG, PNG, WEBP, GIF, BMP, AVIF, or HEIF, and save them directly to your computer.

For more control over your conversions, simply click the extension icon in the toolbar. Here, you can fine-tune the output size and quality of your images before conversion. By default, the original size and highest image quality are maintained.

Developed by EdgeOne.ai, this application offers a quick and free online solution for image format conversion. For your privacy and security, all processed images are automatically deleted after a few hours.

Need to streamline your workflow? If you're interested in automatically converting website images via API or optimizing your website's performance, we're here to help. Reach out to us at https://edgeone.ai/contact for personalized solutions tailored to your needs.
